Text.Name: DiMuWish
Text.Desc: Offer Spirit Stones to Earthmother Shrine

Text.Name: YinYangCanWu
Text.Desc: The Yin Yang Rock contains the rule of Yin and Yang. Meditate on it to gain an insight into cultivation practice.

Text.Name: FeelQi
Text.Desc: There are some incredible Qi surrounding the Illumitree, which can resonate with cultivators.
